title: Mitch Hedberg
content: First post content. I'm sick of following my dreams, man. I'm just going to ask where they're going and hook up with 'em later.

title: President Merkin Muffley, Dr. Strangeglove
content: Second post content. Gentlemen, you can't fight in here. This is the war room.

title: Betty White as Rose in Golden Girls
content: Third post content. My mother always used to say: The older you get, the better you get, unless you're a banana.

title: Jack Handey
content: Fourth post content. Before you criticize someone, you should walk a mile in their shoes. That way when you criticize them, you are a mile away from them and you have their shoes.

title: Bob and Peter, Office Space
content: Fifth post content. Bob: 'Looks like you've been missing a lot of work lately.' Peter: 'I wouldn't say I've been missing it, Bob.'
